name: Chemi Nutra
overview:
Chemi Nutra manufactures science-based nutritional supplement ingredients that address a variety of nutrition and performance-related concerns, including cognitive health, women’s health, weight management, anti-aging, and sports performance.

Chemi Nutra manufactures the nutraceuticals in FDA-inspected production facilities located in Italy and Brazil. While emphasizing strong in-house process development and intellectual property strengths, Chemi Nutra strives to discover and commercialize innovative health promoting nutritional ingredients.

Chemi Nutra, a business unit of Chemi S.p.A., began operation over ten years ago, and is positioned to offer leading-edge nutraceuticals to the dietary supplement and functional foods arenas. Chemi S.p.A., the parent company of Chemi Nutra, is a 35-year-old, privately held nutraceutical and pharmaceutical company, based in Milan, Italy, with several production facilities located in both Italy and Brazil. Chemi became involved in the U.S. nutrition industry in the early 1990s, when it began manufacturing soy-derived phosphatidylserine (PS), which was co-marketed under a well known brand name in the growing U.S. and European nutrition marketplaces.

milestones.description: Patent granted for Phosphatidylserine's (PS) ability to maintain healthy testosterone levels and benefit healthy aging in men.
milestones.source_description: News Release - Patent Granted for PS Ability to Maintain Healthy Testosterone Levels
